Using Drafts Templates Integration Guides
Template Basics Drafts actions consist of “steps”. Action steps are available for a wide range of functions and services: Sending message, mail, saving files and much more. Regardless of what the purpose of the step is, any steps that output information have some fields that allow you to control what text is used by the step, and (with a few small exceptions) use templates to dynamically generate that text.
